cards.title: Fender Stratocaster
cards.subtitle: Classic Electric Guitar
cards.description: Experience the legendary tone that shaped rock history. The Fender Stratocaster delivers versatile sounds from crystal-clear cleans to soaring leads, featuring three single-coil pickups and iconic tremolo bridge.

cards.title: Gibson Les Paul
cards.subtitle: Premium Mahogany Electric
cards.description: Unleash the power of rock with this iconic Gibson Les Paul. Featuring dual humbucking pickups, mahogany body, and maple cap for that legendary thick, warm tone that's perfect for blues, rock, and metal.

cards.title: Martin D-28 Acoustic
cards.subtitle: Dreadnought Steel String
cards.description: Discover the rich, booming sound of this legendary acoustic guitar. Hand-crafted with a solid spruce top and rosewood back, the Martin D-28 delivers exceptional projection and warm, balanced tone.

cards.title: Taylor 814ce
cards.subtitle: Grand Auditorium Acoustic
cards.description: Experience modern acoustic perfection with the Taylor 814ce. Featuring Indian rosewood and Sitka spruce construction, ES2 electronics, and Taylor's renowned playability and crystal-clear tone.

cards.title: Ibanez RG Series
cards.subtitle: High-Performance Electric
cards.description: Built for speed and precision, this Ibanez RG delivers lightning-fast playability. Perfect for metal and progressive rock with its thin neck profile, powerful humbuckers, and floating tremolo system.

cards.title: Yamaha FG830
cards.subtitle: Beginner Acoustic Guitar
cards.description: Start your musical journey with this exceptional entry-level acoustic. The Yamaha FG830 offers professional sound quality at an affordable price, with solid spruce top and excellent build quality.
